verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 2:9
verses.text: For ye remember, brethren, our labour and travail: for labouring night and day, because we would not be chargeable unto any of you, we preached unto you the gospel of God.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 2:10
verses.text: Ye are witnesses, and God also, how holily and justly and unblameably we behaved ourselves among you that believe:

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 2:11
verses.text: As ye know how we exhorted and comforted and charged every one of you, as a father doth his children,

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 2:12
verses.text: That ye would walk worthy of God, who hath called you unto his kingdom and glory.
